Of course, despite the horrible end of Futaro picking Yotsuba for NO REASON AT ALL, after she could NOT POSSIBLY BE the girl he started thinking as special at the end of the fantastic (in the manga) Scrambled Eggs arc (so freaking rushed in Season 2), or her waiting FIVE YEARS until after they're married to tell him that she was the Bell ringer kisser, and first Kyoto Girl, that Ichika was the 2nd Kyoto Girl, that Itsuki was in the role of Reina, after all that, we STILL end up with a harem ending, with them all going on the Honeymoon together, not another man in sight for any of the 4 other Quints....or just dismiss it all as a dream...a shitty dream by a mangaka who completely betrayed gis readers.

@Turbohuman I felt like Negi Haruba rushed the ending of the manga. Also I would have preferred a third season of the anime, but I think the movie releasing later in May to wrap up the final volumes is fine. Would have preferred either Miku or Nino over airhead Yotsuba tho.

I have mixed feelings for the tag that is NTR. It is different from polygamy or more common, but lustful fetishes. It is a fetish based on deception and infidelity, and even if you isolate the elements that you like from the Doujin, like the characters or specific panels, the fact remains that you fap to artwork that actively encourages disloyalty between couples as well as slutty behavior. But is that even a problem? We may be headed into a big societal change regarding loving relationships. with the liberalization of society we could see new ways of living our sexuality, with polygamy and hardcore fetishes becoming commonplace. In that case, the appearance of the NTR tag in closed circles dedicated to porn storing and sharing could be considered a precursor, or rather a symptom of the ongoing crisis. I hope that traditional values are not completely wiped out of our culture.

Call me crazy but I am not even upset about the Netorare but am upset about the difference in canon between this and the same Author’s adult Miku doujin. In that doujin it is stated that Yotsuba will only be added when She and Fuutarou are divorced but in this one She is already in it at high school so it is two different canon. The author could have just made this a sequel to the Adult Miku doujin by drawing them as milfs (that would be hot) and there would be contunity or he could just exclude Yotsuba or have her actually leave. Again call me crazy for caring about such irellevant things in a NTR doujin but it was a good oportunity for a sequel and it would have not even be NTR since Yotsuba would be divorced. Like I personally do not consider the Miku one NTR because it happens after the manga ended and thus Miku already lost so She can fuck anyone she wants and it would not be related to Fuutarou
